name: 2024 8th International Conference on Applied Economics and Business
content: Publication: Submitted papers must be original and contain work that has not been published before or is under review elsewhere. Accepted papers will be published by Springer Nature as book chapter in a volume of the Springer Proceedings in Business and Economics book series (SPBE, e-ISSN: 2198-7254, print ISSN: 2198-7246). The books series now is indexed by Scopus, zbMATH, etc.
